author: Allison Prang
title: Brink’s to Buy Cash-Management Firm Dunbar for $520 Million
text:
Brink’s Co. has agreed to buy rival Dunbar Armored Inc. for about $520 million in cash, a move that furthers consolidates the cash-management business in the U.S.
Brink’s said Thursday the deal will expand its customer base with Dunbar’s “complementary focus on small- to medium-size retailers and financial institutions.” Brink’s said Dunbar is the fourth-largest cash-management firm in the U.S.
Dunbar...
